channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light out o/s 53 & 55 Lyndon Avenue, 11th November
item.description:
Light out o/s 53 & 55 Lyndon Avenue - Resident said it has been out for quite some time now and it is now quite frightening now it is getting darker earlier

item.title: O/s 47 Charteris road, 11th November
item.description:
Blocked gully and lots of sewage mess on Charteris road o/s 47. Likely caused by the blocked drains from door 47.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charteris Road, London

item.title: Very loud rattling loose manhole cover, 11th November
item.description:
This manhole cover has been loose for months. It rattles very loudly every time the car goes over it. It echoes across the street and keeps my children awake at night. Please fix it as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Friern Barnet Lane, Whetstone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
